title: Error page!

http.403: You are not authorized to access this page.

concurrencyFailure: Another user modified this data at the same time as you. Your changes were rejected.

form.required: This field is required type something.

form.maxlength: This field cannot be longer than {{ max }} characters.

form.number: This field should be a number.
